name: Siphon
description: You touch a creature and siphon their life force, dealing 3 true damage and healing yourself for 1 health. While you maintain concentration, at the end of the target's turn, they must make an endurance check of 6 or take 3 true damage again and you heal for 1 health. Humanoids must make an endurance check of 8 instead. This spell cannot heal you above half your maximum health. Elementals, undead, and constructs are immune to this spell.
charge: The damage increases to 4 true damage and the healing increases to 2 health. This spell can heal you above half your maximum health.
